questions.title: Mediums
questions.question: A wave travels through a medium. Which of the following is true about the wave if its amplitude is increased?
answers: The frequency of the wave increases.
The energy carried by the wave increases.
The wavelength of the wave decreases.

questions.question: A wave has velocity {0}m and frequency {1}, what is its wavelength?

questions.title: Energy Models
questions.question:
The photoelectric effect and the Bohr model both involve the quantisation of energy.
Name one difference between the two in the use of this concept
questions.answer: The photoelectric effect deals with the quantisation of energy of light/photons, where Bohr deals with electrons.
